mapper.select: SELECT category_name AS categoryName, category_addr AS categoryAddr, category_tag AS categoryTag FROM category WHERE res_idx = #{resIdx}

mapper.update: UPDATE restaurant SET res_image1 = #{storeData.resImage1}, res_image2 = #{storeData.resImage2}, res_image3 = #{storeData.resImage3}, res_name = #{storeData.resName}, res_call = #{storeData.resCall}, res_address1 = #{storeData.resAddress1}, res_address2 = #{storeData.resAddress2}, res_introduce = #{storeData.resIntroduce}, res_reserve_time = #{storeData.resReserveTime} WHERE res_idx = #{resIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant_time (res_idx, day, start_time, end_time) VALUES (#{resIdx}, #{day}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT day, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime FROM restaurant_time WHERE res_idx = #{resIdx}
